alert.note: Alert for Bledsoe; Hamilton; Sequatchie (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 05 at 9:19PM CDT until June 05 at 9:45PM CDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Morristown has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Sequatchie County in east Tennessee... South central Bledsoe County in east Tennessee... Central Hamilton County in east Tennessee... * Until 1045 PM EDT/945 PM CDT/. * At 1019 PM EDT/919 PM CDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located near Dunlap, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Dunlap, Soddy-Daisy, Lakesite, Flat Top Mountain, North Chickamauga Creek Gorge, Mowbray Mountain, Middle Valley, Shady Grove, Falling Water and Sale Creek. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
